class openstack_network_operations(OpenstackConnect):
    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()

    def list_security_groups(self):
        return list(self.conn.network.security_groups())

    def create_security_group(self, name, description):
        return self.conn.network.create_security_group(name=name, description=description)

    def delete_security_group(self, security_group_id):
        self.conn.network.delete_security_group(security_group_id)

    def add_security_group_rule(self, rule):
        return self.conn.network.create_security_group_rule(**rule)

    def delete_security_group_rule(self, rule_id):
        self.conn.network.delete_security_group_rule(rule_id)
